resources.string:
"You're not connected to WLAN at the moment. %s
Can't get file size info. To use your mobile data connection to download this file, tap %s. To wait and download this file when you're connected to WLAN, tap %s."
Using your mobile data connection to download these %s files (%s ) will increase your mobile data usage.
"Not enough space on your device's internal storage"
"Can't get file size info. To use your mobile data connection to download this file, tap %s. To wait and download this file when you're connected to WLAN, tap %s."
Using your mobile data connection to download this file (%s ) will increase your mobile data usage.
